content:
Could you write a job description for this?
Some more information:
1) We use Mailchimp for sending the monthly Newsletter
2) The employee has to come up with ideas and write articles
3) The content has to be postet on our Wordpress-Website
4) We have a Canva-Account for editing images
5) Posts on Instagram and Facebook twice per week
6) Answer Messages on Instagram and Facebook daily

And please add some more information about the company "Severin Travel Africa".
